pages.test: Test Indulge in our exquisite dining and thrilling entertainment by booking your stay at Royal Lotus Casino & Resort. Our reservation team is available 24/7 to assist with your booking and answer any questions you may have. We offer a range of packages and special offers to enhance your stay, including romantic getaways, family vacations, and more. Secure your reservation today and begin planning your perfect escape. Contact Information We are here to help you with all your needs and inquiries. Feel free to reach out to us by phone, email, or through our website to secure your reservation and plan your stay. - Address: Subhash Chowk Road Near Dalhousie Club, Moti Tiba, Dalhousie 176304, India - Phone: +91 1899-240760 - Fax: +91 1899-240609 - Email: royal.lotus.reservations@gmail.com Our dedicated reservation team is available around the clock to provide you with exceptional service. Whether you need assistance with booking your stay, have questions about our facilities, or require special arrangements, our team is here to ensure your experience is seamless and enjoyable. We pride ourselves on our prompt and personalized service, making your satisfaction our top priority. We offer a variety of packages and special offers designed to make your stay at Royal Lotus Casino & Resort even more memorable. Whether you're planning a romantic getaway, a family vacation, or a special celebration, we have the perfect package to suit your needs. Contact our reservation team to learn more about our current promotions and to customize your stay with us. Stay connected with us on social media for the latest news, promotions, and updates. Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter to stay in the loop and be the first to know about our special offers and events. Our social media channels are a great way to engage with us, share your experiences, and connect with other guests. - Facebook: [Royal Lotus Casino & Resort Facebook](#) - Instagram: [Royal Lotus Casino & Resort Instagram](#) - Twitter: [Royal Lotus Casino & Resort Twitter](#) Getting to Royal Lotus Casino & Resort is easy. We are located at Subhash Chowk Road Near Dalhousie Club, Moti Tiba, Dalhousie 176304, India. For your convenience, we offer detailed directions and transportation options on our website. Whether you are traveling by car, bus, or train, our resort is easily accessible. If you need assistance with transportation arrangements, please do not hesitate to contact our concierge team. Our concierge team is dedicated to making your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. From arranging transportation and booking tickets for local attractions to making dining reservations and providing recommendations, our concierge services are here to assist you with all your needs. Let us take care of the details so you can focus on enjoying your stay at Royal Lotus Casino & Resort. We value your feedback and are always eager to hear from our guests. If you have any comments, suggestions, or inquiries, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. Your feedback helps us improve our services and ensure that we continue to provide the best possible experience for our guests. For your convenience, we also offer an online contact form on our website. Simply fill out the form with your details and your inquiry, and a member of our team will get back to you promptly. Whether you have a question about your booking, need information about our facilities, or have a special request, we are here to help. At Royal Lotus Casino & Resort, we are committed to providing you with an unforgettable experience. From the moment you contact us to the moment you check out, we strive to exceed your expectations and make your stay as enjoyable as possible. We look forward to welcoming you to our resort and providing you with the highest level of service and hospitality.
